crash_course_description: A partial annotated bibliography of the Mempool, building the case for why bitcoin will displace all competing currencies, including altcoins, fiat money, and precious metals

complete_satoshi_tag: Between 2008 and 2012, Satoshi Nakamoto shared with the world a brilliant vision and the code to build it.
version_control_description: This page contains files for the first three available Bitcoin codebases written by Satoshi Nakamoto. Version control and releases from v0.1.5 onward can be viewed in the Bitcoin GitHub repository.
indexed_wisdom: Indexed wisdom from the quotable Satoshi.
bitcoin_title: Bitcoin: A Peer-to-Peer Electronic Cash System
satoshi_quote_extended:
It’s very attractive to the libertarian viewpoint if we can explain it properly.
I’m better with code than with words though.
quotable_satoshi_acknowledgements: Special thanks to Jordan Tuwiner for indexing quotations.
